Package model

Class TournamentController

java.lang.Object
model.TournamentController
public class TournamentController extends Object
Controller for managing a football tournament.

  • Constructor Details

    • TournamentController

      public TournamentController()
      Constructor for TournamentController. Initializes the lists of teams, referees, and matches.

  • Method Details

    • addTeam

      public boolean addTeam(String name, String country, String coach)
      Adds a team to the tournament.
      Parameters:
      name - Name of the team.
      country - Country of the team.
      coach - Name of the team's coach.
      Returns:
      true if the team is added successfully, false if the team already exists.

    • addPlayerToTeam

      public boolean addPlayerToTeam(String teamName, String playerName, int age, Position position)
      Adds a player to a specific team.
      Parameters:
      teamName - Name of the team to which the player will be added.
      playerName - Name of the player.
      age - Age of the player.
      position - Position of the player on the field.
      Returns:
      true if the player is added successfully, false if the team is not found or the player is already registered.

    • addReferee

      public void addReferee(String name, String nationality, RefereeType type)
      Adds a referee to the tournament.
      Parameters:
      name - Name of the referee.
      nationality - Nationality of the referee.
      type - Type of referee (MAIN, ASSISTANT, FOURTH).

    • preloadData

      public void preloadData()
      Preloads data for teams in the tournament.

    • createFixture

      public void createFixture()
      Creates the fixture of matches between the registered teams.

    • getMatches

      public List<Match> getMatches()
      Gets the list of matches.
      Returns:
      List of matches.

    • assignRefereeToMatch

      public void assignRefereeToMatch(int matchIndex, String nationality)
      Assigns a referee to a specific match.
      Parameters:
      matchIndex - Index of the match to which the referee will be assigned.
      nationality - Nationality of the referee to assign.

    • setMatchScore

      public void setMatchScore(int matchIndex, int scoreTeam1, int scoreTeam2)
      Records the score of a specific match.
      Parameters:
      matchIndex - Index of the match to record the score.
      scoreTeam1 - Score of team 1.
      scoreTeam2 - Score of team 2.
